content: Is there a place with Kamala's scheduled rallies listed to sign up to go? I have friends reaching out because our news announced she will be in Vegas next week. How can we rsvp? https://www.fox5vegas.com/2024/07/31/kamala-harris-introduce-democratic-vp-nominee-nevada-next-week/
I have the same question about rsvp for the philly visit on Tuesday. Would like details please!
Also if Joe, Jill or Doug are out on the trail how can we sign up to see them?
I see the events, but not where to sign up to go or where exactly they’ll be in those cities

On mobilize.us you can sort using the filters. People sign up on the same site. Unfortunately, I don't know where there is just an appearance schedule for just the leaders.  I imagine that information is sparsed out for security concerns. I was responsible for George HW Bush's visit to Disney (yeah, LONG time ago) and I couldn't even tell my husband what I was doing.
I signed up for the Vegas rally on Saturday because that's where I live they don't have the location or the time so I guess we wait till the last minute which is definitely understandable
The local newspaper released that she was going to be here on Saturday with her VP before we even knew who the VP was
Awesome that ya'll are able to go to rallies in person. The locations have been last minute for security reasons. I would love to see more airport rallies, so cool when they pull up in a big plane.
My niece is frustrated trying to find info for the Pittsburgh area stop in the bus tour Sunday. Any guidance?
So far rally info has been last minute. I encourage your neice to reach out to her local area democratic offices since this the tour says this stop will visit "volunteer canvass events".
